venue.name: Rabb Auditorium at Boston Public Library in Copley Square

item.description:
This is the second/alternate introductory meeting, see details in Sept. 17th meetup description

Professions filled:

-attorney, business and technology
-beauty/skin care consultant
-financial advisor/ planner
-nutritional supplement consultant
-telecommunication/ cell phone sales

Great first meeting everyone, looking forward to seeing you at the next!!

As before, we will meet at the benches in the lobby (when you first walk in the library on the right side). Also, think of some other places in the area that you would like as a meeting location once we have a good size group!

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Introductory Meeting, All Welcome
